org.lwjgl.ovr

Class OVRGLTexture

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.ovr.OVRGLTexture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public final class OVRGLTexture
extends java.lang.Object
implements Pointer
    Contains OpenGL-specific texture information.
